name: Historical benthos data from the Romanian Black Sea Coast between 1959 and 1961
description: The dataset comprises data on the substrate type, temperature, salinity and benthos from 77 samples colectedin 3 fixed points(P1 - 44.2357 Lat. N, 28.6288Long. E, depth - 1.5 m; P2 - 44.2388 Lat. N,28.6363 Long. E, depth - 4.5m; P3 - 44.2416 Lat. N, 28.6447 Long. E, depth - 8 m) intheperiod 20.10 1959 - 2.11.1961, in Mamaia sector (Constanta, Romanian Black Sea Coast). Thesediment samples were taken with a Van-Veengrab, the sampling size of the first 28 samples was - 0.1m2, while for the rest of 29 - 77 samples it was 0.05 m2. The sampleshave been preserved with 10% buffered formalin, then sieved through a 1 and 0.25mm mesh sieve and subsequently stored in 70% ethanol. The database comprises taxonomic and quantitative data (individuals count, density and wet weight biomass per squaremeter) for 30 macrobenthic species and 6 supraspecificgroups.
